title: Watch now: How to get a pay rise in 2022
text:
As the cost of living spirals, getting a pay rise is probably top of your financial to-do list for 2022. But what are the tips and tricks that could give you a better chance of success?

Click above to watch the replay of Wednesday's LinkedIn live, moderated by Claer Barrett, presenter of the FT's Money Clinic podcast, with experts Isabel Berwick, presenter of the FT's new Working It podcast, and Jonathan Black, the FT's Dear Jonathan columnist and head of the University of Oxford careers service.

In the 30 minute session, the experts discuss the dos and don'ts, offer practical tips and reveal the moment when employees have the most leverage to ask for a raise.

They tackle questions from FT readers about the merits of eliciting a job offer from a rival firm to get a raise, how freelancers can negotiate upping their rates and how to broach the topic of pay when returning from parental leave.

For expert advice and practical suggestions you can't afford to miss, watch the video in the player above, or head to the Financial Times LinkedIn page.
